front.title: Analysis of the Security of BGP/MPLS IP VPNs

abstract.t: This document analyses the security of the BGP/MPLS IP VPN architecture that is described in RFC 2547bis [13], for the benefit of service providers and VPN users. The analysis shows that BGP/MPLS IP VPN networks can be as secure as traditional layer-2 VPN services using ATM or Frame Relay.
